embed.title: :shield: Knights! Equip Your Shields! :shield:
embed.description: The realm calls for your presence! The horns of **WAR** echo across the land. The banners rise. The time has come. Join your fellow warriors in battle and defend the **⚔️ KINGDOM OF KNIGHTS⚔️ **.

footer.text: ⚔️ For glory. For the Kingdom. For each other! ⚔️
